contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Varaville |image = Varaville Ã©glise.JPG |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Caen |canton = Cabourg |INSEE = 14724 |postal code = 14390 |mayor = Joseph Letorey |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Estuaire de la Dives |longitude = -0.1569 |latitude = 49.2542 |elevation m = 20 |elevation min m = 2 |elevation max m = 20 |area km2 = 16.49 |population = 795 |population date = 2008 }} {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Varaville}} '''Varaville''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. It gives its name to the [[Battle of Varaville]], which was fought in 1057. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left |1793|186 |1800|276 |1806|319 |1821|320 |1831|254 |1836|263 |1841|292 |1846|310 |1851|292 |1856|309 |1861|297 |1866|311 |1872|261 |1876|247 |1881|250 |1886|252 |1891|289 |1896|319 |1901|320 |1906|341 |1911|366 |1921|424 |1926|488 |1931|561 |1936|524 |1946|397 |1954|570 |1962|461 |1968|511 |1975|595 |1982|729 |1990|826 |1999|815 |2006|774 |2008|795 }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/fr/bases-de-donnees/esl/comparateur.asp?codgeo=COM-14724 INSEE statistics] {{reflist}} {{commonscat}} {{Calvados communes}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
